LanguageData.FT_FrailBack.degreeDatas.0.label: frail back
LanguageData.FT_FrailBack.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a frail back so [PAWN_pronoun] can't carry as much as the average person.
LanguageData.FT_StrongBack.degreeDatas.0.label: strong back
LanguageData.FT_StrongBack.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a strong back which allows [PAWN_objective] to carry more than most people.
LanguageData.FT_StrongBack.degreeDatas.1.label: very strong back
LanguageData.FT_StrongBack.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a very strong back or is part mule or something. [PAWN_pronoun] can carry twice as much as a normal person.
LanguageData.FT_AnimalFriend.degreeDatas.0.label: animal friend
LanguageData.FT_AnimalFriend.degreeDatas.0.descriptio: [PAWN_nameDef] has a passion for animals. [PAWN_pronoun] gets bonuses to all animal interactions.
LanguageData.FT_Ghoulish.degreeDatas.0.label: ghoulish
LanguageData.FT_Ghoulish.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is still human, mostly. [PAWN_pronoun] is immune to the effects of toxic fallout but their ghoulish appearance makes interacting with others difficult.
LanguageData.FT_RadResistant.degreeDatas.0.label: rad resistant
LanguageData.FT_RadResistant.degreeDatas.0.descriptio: [PAWN_nameDef]'s body has built up a resistance to the negative effects of toxic fallout.
LanguageData.FT_ActionBoy.degreeDatas.0.label: action boy
LanguageData.FT_ActionBoy.degreeDatas.0.description: There's no time to waste! [PAWN_nameDef] has increased movement and work speed.
LanguageData.FT_ActionGirl.degreeDatas.0.label: action girl
LanguageData.FT_ActionGirl.degreeDatas.0.description: There's no time to waste! [PAWN_nameDef] has increased movement and work speed.
LanguageData.FT_QuickHands.degreeDatas.0.label: quick hands
LanguageData.FT_QuickHands.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has quick hands. When it comes to [PAWN_possessive] hands, [PAWN_nameDef] never hesitates.
LanguageData.FT_IdiotSavant.degreeDatas.0.label: idiot savant
LanguageData.FT_IdiotSavant.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] isn't stupid! [PAWN_pronoun] is just... different. [PAWN_pronoun] learns twice as fast but works slower than normal, [PAWN_pronoun] is also incapable handling some tasks.
LanguageData.FT_Charisma.degreeDatas.0.label: charismatic
LanguageData.FT_Charisma.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a charismatic personality. [PAWN_pronoun] gets bonuses to all human-like social interactions.
LanguageData.FT_Charisma.degreeDatas.1.label: very charismatic
LanguageData.FT_Charisma.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a very charismatic personality. [PAWN_pronoun] gets bonuses to all human-like social interactions.
LanguageData.FT_GunNut.degreeDatas.0.label: gun nut
LanguageData.FT_GunNut.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a gun nut, [PAWN_pronoun] loves guns. [PAWN_pronoun] gets a mood bonus while holding a ranged weapon.
LanguageData.FT_Rooted.degreeDatas.0.label: rooted
LanguageData.FT_Rooted.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is part tree! [PAWN_pronoun] can really take a beating!
LanguageData.FT_Intimidation.degreeDatas.0.label: intimidating
LanguageData.FT_Intimidation.degreeDatas.0.descriptio: [PAWN_nameDef] has an intimidating personality, this gives [PAWN_objective] an advantage in social interactions.
LanguageData.FT_Intimidation.degreeDatas.1.label: very intimidating
LanguageData.FT_Intimidation.degreeDatas.1.descriptio: [PAWN_nameDef] has a very intimidating personality, this gives [PAWN_objective] a big advantage in social interactions.
LanguageData.FT_Scrapper.degreeDatas.0.label: scrapper
LanguageData.FT_Scrapper.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is good at working with scrap metal. [PAWN_pronoun] is great with a smelter and is efficient when using building materials.
LanguageData.FT_FortuneFinder.degreeDatas.0.label: fortune finder
LanguageData.FT_FortuneFinder.degreeDatas.0.descripti: [PAWN_nameDef] seems to discover hidden wealth where ever [PAWN_pronoun] goes.
LanguageData.FT_AimOffset.degreeDatas.0.label: poor aim
LanguageData.FT_AimOffset.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has poor hand-eye coordination and will miss [PAWN_possessive] target more often in combat.
LanguageData.FT_AimOffset.degreeDatas.1.label: steady aim
LanguageData.FT_AimOffset.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has great hand-eye coordination and will miss [PAWN_possessive] target less often in combat.
LanguageData.FT_Agility.degreeDatas.0.label: agile
LanguageData.FT_Agility.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has good reflexes and moves with finesse. [PAWN_pronoun] will land and dodge more attacks in melee combat.
LanguageData.FT_Agility.degreeDatas.1.label: ninja-like
LanguageData.FT_Agility.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has great reflexes and moves like a ninja. [PAWN_pronoun] will land and dodge more attacks in melee combat.
LanguageData.FT_Stupid.degreeDatas.0.label: stupid
LanguageData.FT_Stupid.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] isn't very smart. [PAWN_pronoun] can mess up doing just about anything.
LanguageData.FT_Intelligence.degreeDatas.0.label: intelligent
LanguageData.FT_Intelligence.degreeDatas.0.descriptio: [PAWN_nameDef] is smarter than average. [PAWN_pronoun] learns faster and has a good understanding of the world around [PAWN_objective].
LanguageData.FT_Intelligence.degreeDatas.1.label: very intelligent
LanguageData.FT_Intelligence.degreeDatas.1.descriptio: [PAWN_nameDef] is very smart. [PAWN_pronoun] learns faster and has a great understanding of the world around [PAWN_objective].
LanguageData.FT_Oblivious.degreeDatas.0.label: oblivious
LanguageData.FT_Oblivious.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] isn't very aware of [PAWN_possessive] surroundings, or anything at all really. [PAWN_pronoun]
LanguageData.FT_Perception.degreeDatas.0.label: Perceptive
LanguageData.FT_Perception.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a good awareness of [PAWN_possessive] surroundings and has a good understanding of how [PAWN_possessive] actions affects others.
LanguageData.FT_Perception.degreeDatas.1.label: very perceptive
LanguageData.FT_Perception.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is very aware of [PAWN_possessive] surroundings and has a great understanding of how [PAWN_possessive] actions affects others.
LanguageData.FT_Scrounger.degreeDatas.0.label: scrounger
LanguageData.FT_Scrounger.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] knows how to scavenge and gather for resources quickly.
LanguageData.FT_Endurance.degreeDatas.0.label: enduring
LanguageData.FT_Endurance.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has good health and an enduring personality. [PAWN_pronoun] is better at handling stressful situations than others.
LanguageData.FT_Endurance.degreeDatas.1.label: very enduring
LanguageData.FT_Endurance.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has exceptional health and a very enduring personality. [PAWN_pronoun] is capable of handling high stress situations that others cannot.
